snippet: The Southern Baptist Convention re-elected the Rev. Fred Luter Jr. as the denomination’s president at its annual meeting Tuesday in Houston.
abstract: Southern Baptist Convention re-elects Rev Fred Luter Jr as denomination's president at its annual meeting in Houston.
lead_paragraph: The Southern Baptist Convention re-elected the Rev. Fred Luter Jr. as the denomination’s president at its annual meeting Tuesday in Houston.

headline.seo: Texas: Southern Baptist Convention Re-elects Leader
headline.main: Texas: Southern Baptist Convention Re-elects Leader
